p:
Apart from concerns about morbidity, mortality and economic loss associated with COVID‐19, there are significant concerns regarding the management of other communicable and non‐communicable diseases due to ongoing lockdown in the country. A number of factors indicate collapsed healthcare system, particularly shortage of healthcare workforce, poor infrastructure, limited availability of pharmacist at community settings and poor availability of essential medicines at drug retail outlets. 94
